summary: A simple nord dungeon with some bandits
descriptionHtml: This is my first attempt at making a dungeon.  It has some bandits and a boss at the end.  Any feedback and constructive criticism is appreciated.  Requires base game + update and all dlc.  Hope you all enjoy.  To find it look along the path to Whiterun from Riverwood.  There is a map marker and it is fast travel ready.
author: Chimaira44
